subtitleNullable: A Comprehensive Collection of Sports News Articles and Scores
descriptionNullable:
The dataset has data for three sports:
1. Cricket
2. Football
3. Tennis

Each sport has the latest scores and latest news. 
The cricket dataset has scores for live, recent, and upcoming matches and commentary.
The football dataset has scores for recent and upcoming matches.
All the sports have the latest news titles.
